    Copyright (C), 2015-2020,FEITIAN Technologies Co., Ltd. All rights reserved. LED indicators operating interface.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Led getInstance(android.content.Context context)

      • ledStatus

        public int ledStatus(boolean redLED,
                     boolean yellowLED,
                     boolean greenLED,
                     boolean blueLED)
        This method is used to turn on the LED indicator.
        Parameters:
        redLED - Light up the red led light; true:light on; false:light off;
        yellowLED - Light up the red yellow light true:light on; false:light off;
        greenLED - Light up the red green light true:light on; false:light off;
        blueLED - Light up the red blue light true:light on; false:light off;
        Returns:
        0: Success; Other values: Error code. Refer toErrCode;

      • readerLedStatus

        public int readerLedStatus(int readerModule,
                           boolean redLED,
                           boolean greenLED,
                           boolean blueLED)
        This method is used to turn on the LED indicator of readers.
        Parameters:
        readerModule - 0x01 icReader; 0x02 magReader； 0x03 icReader and magReader
        redLED - Light up the red led light; true:light on; false:light off;
        greenLED - Light up the red green light true:light on; false:light off;
        blueLED - Light up the red blue light true:light on; false:light off;
        Returns:
        0-success; other value:Refer to ErrCode

      • tapeLampOn

        public int tapeLampOn(com.ftpos.apiservice.aidl.led.LedConfig config,
                      int bBrightness)
        Turn on the tape lamp with the specified RGB and Brightness values.
        Parameters:
        config - The color of tape lamp
        bBrightness - the value scope is 0-100
        Returns:
        0-success; other value:Refer to ErrCode

      • tapeLampOff

        public int tapeLampOff()
        Turn off the tape lamp.
        Returns:
        0-success; other value:Refer to ErrCode

      • breathOn

        public int breathOn(java.util.List<com.ftpos.apiservice.aidl.led.LedConfig> config,
                    int bMaxBrightness,
                    int bMinBrightness,
                    int bBrightnessStep,
                    long timeGap)
        Set the breathing parameters of the tape lamp.
        Parameters:
        config - The color of tape lamp
        bMaxBrightness - The value scope is 0-100, and mast larger than bMinBrightness.
        bMinBrightness - The value scope is 0-100, and mast smaller than bMaxBrightness.
        bBrightnessStep - The value of each change.
        timeGap - The time interval between changes, the unit is milliseconds.
        Returns:
        0-success; other value:Refer to ErrCode

      • marqueeOn

        public int marqueeOn(java.util.List<com.ftpos.apiservice.aidl.led.LedConfig> list,
                     int brightness,
                     int direction,
                     long timeGap)
        Set the marquee parameters of the tape lamp.
        Parameters:
        list - the colors of the tape lamp
        brightness - the brightness of tape lamp, the value scope is 0-100.
        direction - The value must be either 0 or 1, 0 means clockwise and 1 means counterclockwise.
        timeGap - The time interval between change, the unit is milliseconds.
        Returns:
        0-success; other value:Refer to ErrCode

      • ledDefault

        public int ledDefault()
        Set the system to have default colors on and off
        Returns:
        0-success; other value:Refer to ErrCode

      • ledCardIndicator

        public int ledCardIndicator(int type,
                            int times,
                            int onTime,
                            int offTime)
        Parameters:
        type - 0-turn off 1-turn on 2-flicker synchronous 3-flicker asynchronous
        times - flicker times
        onTime - Light up time
        offTime - light off time
        Returns:
        0-success; other value:Refer to ErrCode

      • ledPartsStatus

        public int ledPartsStatus(boolean redLED,
                          boolean yellowLED,
                          boolean greenLED,
                          boolean blueLED)
        This method is used to turn on the LED indicator.
        Parameters:
        redLED - Light up the red led light; true:light on; false:light off;
        yellowLED - Light up the red yellow light true:light on; false:light off;
        greenLED - Light up the red green light true:light on; false:light off;
        blueLED - Light up the red blue light true:light on; false:light off;
        Returns:
        0: Success; Other values: Error code. Refer toErrCode;
